thread.title: Cher Tweets Thoroughly Debunked Gun Control Lie, Gets Schooled By Dana Loesch
thread.title_full: Cher Tweets Thoroughly Debunked Gun Control Lie, Gets Schooled By Dana Loesch

author: Andrew Mark Miller
title: Cher Tweets Thoroughly Debunked Gun Control Lie, Gets Schooled By Dana Loesch
text:
11:12pm February 14,   
Cher has made it pretty clear over the last few years that she doesn‚Äôt know very much about politics. 
Here‚Äôs her latest declaration to the world that she doesn‚Äôt pay attention to details. House Republicans Just Voted To Allow Severely Mentally Ill People To Buy Guns HOW IS THIS POSSIBLE?GOD PROTECT USüôèüèª https://t.co/GJFbxzREMJ 
‚Äî Cher (@cher) February 14, 2017 
Rachel Maddow got in on the action too. Senate due to vote today to make it easier for seriously mentally ill people to get guns (I swear I'm not kidding). Already passed House. 
‚Äî Rachel Maddow MSNBC (@maddow) February 14, 2017 
That‚Äôs a lie. 
5 seconds of research will tell you very clearly that‚Äôs not what happened . 
Dana Loesch stepped in and brought some facts to the table. Lie. They're rolling back rule that allowed SSA bureaucrats to adjudicate beneficiaries as unfit to carry sans mental eval. DUE PROCESS. https://t.co/dQYoFVOqVP 
‚Äî Dana Loesch (@DLoesch) February 15, 2017 Gun control groups want to strip seniors (and vets) of their #2A rights simply if they receive financial management assistance. Insane. https://t.co/Dg4fs65WoI 
‚Äî Dana Loesch (@DLoesch) February 13, 2017 Again, lie. Bill undoes EO that targeted SSA beneficiaries‚Äô gun rights just for receiving financial management. https://t.co/amlr8b4pYN pic.twitter.com/42F9OmjpDc 
‚Äî Dana Loesch (@DLoesch) February 14, 2017 
Yeah, I‚Äôd call that a pretty thorough beat down. 
Dana doesn‚Äôt mess around when it comes to protecting the 2A. 
Are Maddow and Cher lying? Or are they really this dumb? 
Guess it doesn‚Äôt really matter. LIKE this article? I hated this article. I'm a liberal.
